animeTitle: The Strongest Immortal Lord Chen Luoxuan
otherNames: The Strongest Immortal Lord Chen Luoxuan, The Strongest Immortal Venerable Chen Luoxuan, 最强仙尊陈洛轩
synopsis: The great immortal venerable Chen Luoxuan fell in a fierce battle with Haotian’s residual consciousness and was reborn back to his teenage years a million years ago. He decided to re-cultivate step by step, reaching the ultimate great completion, while making up for all the regrets of his past life.
